briefTitle: Taxane Induced Peripheral Neuropathy in Chinese Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Taxane Induced Peripheral Neuropathy in Chinese Patients With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Total score from the FACT-GOG-Ntx questionnaire
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of breast cancer
* Females aged 16 and older
* Planning to receive or previous treated with taxanes

Exclusion Criteria:

* Poorly controlled or insulin-dependent diabetes or other condition likely to predispose to neurotoxicity
